com.netscape.certsrv.policy

Interface IEnrollmentPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPolicy, IPolicyRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentPolicy, AttributePresentConstraints, AuthInfoAccessExt, AuthorityKeyIdentifierExt, BasicConstraintsExt, CertificatePoliciesExt, CertificateRenewalWindowExt, CertificateScopeOfUseExt, CRLDistributionPointsExt, DSAKeyConstraints, ExtendedKeyUsageExt, GenericASN1Ext, IssuerAltNameExt, IssuerConstraints, KeyAlgorithmConstraints, KeyUsageExt, ManualAuthentication, NameConstraintsExt, NSCCommentExt, NSCertTypeExt, OCSPNoCheckExt, PolicyConstraintsExt, PolicyMappingsExt, PrivateKeyUsagePeriodExt, RemoveBasicConstraintsExt, RSAKeyConstraints, SigningAlgorithmConstraints, SubCANameConstraints, SubjAltNameExt, SubjectAltNameExt, SubjectDirectoryAttributesExt, SubjectKeyIdentifierExt, UniqueSubjectName, UniqueSubjectNameConstraints, ValidityConstraints
    Deprecated.

    public interface IEnrollmentPolicy
extends IPolicyRule
    Interface for an enrollment policy rule. This provides general typing for rules so that a policy processor can group rules based on a particular type. 

     NOTE:  The Policy Framework has been replaced by the Profile Framework.

    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.netscape.certsrv.policy.IPolicyRule

        PROP_ENABLE, PROP_IMPLNAME, PROP_PREDICATE
